title: "Dallas Construction Giant Is Bringing AI to the Jobsite to See What the Crane Hook Sees"
excerpt: "Dallas-based construction giant Austin Commercial is partnering with Versatile, a California construction tech startup, on the use of CraneView. The hardware connects to cranes \"below the hook,\" measuring key data points to help reduce construction time while increasing the number of loads picked up."
